descriptors.name: at_commands_soc
descriptors.label: AT Commands (SoC)
descriptors.description: The AT commands application is a command-line interface (CLI) application designed to showcase various functionalities and capabilities of SiWx91x in different scenarios and configuration modes. It serves as a quick reference guide and a hands-on demonstration of SiWx91x core features for developers and users.
